titles.title: Keeping Aircraft Away from Terrorists Act of 2016
Keeping Aircraft Away from Terrorists Act of 2016
A bill to prohibit the issuing of licenses for the export or reexport of aircraft and related parts and services to Iran.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Keeping Aircraft Away from Terrorists Act of 2016
This bill prohibits the President and executive agencies from issuing a license under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act, or providing other guidance, that allows a person, depository institution, registered securities broker or dealer, or foreign financial institution to conduct a transaction related to the export of aircraft to Iran.
